name: Fall boys (Huzza, PapsiViper, Cyon)
description:
Fall Boys:

A huge catastrophe has occurred, the entire population of Earth has fallen out of a plane and are headed to their demise. Catch as many as you can and survive for as long as possible to gain the highest score!

Collect the glowing purple balls to 2x your ring size.

Go through the gold rings to increase your multiplier for each person that passes through!

Use the arrow keys to navigate your boys across the screen.
